changes: Set project version to 3.0.0 across all modules.
Fixed NPE in TablistManager when applyAnimatedGradient returned null (animation fallback now uses normal format).
Fixed stale ChatFormatter reference in PlaceholderAPI expansion after /reload — expansion now resolves formatter via Supplier.
Fixed ConcurrentModificationException — all LockiConfig internal maps changed to ConcurrentHashMap for safe async chat access.
Fixed scoreboard team name collision for similar player names — teams now use a UUID-based suffix instead of truncated player name.
Fixed scoreboard team memory leak on player disconnect — team entries are now cleaned up and empty teams unregistered.
Fixed thenRunAsync() in mid/modern PrefixMenuManager using ForkJoinPool for Bukkit API calls — now routes through Bukkit scheduler executor.
Fixed missing error handling on createGroup() and groupExists() CompletableFuture chains — players now receive error feedback and menu reopens on failure.
Fixed hex color support detection for MC 1.22+ in mid module — now uses minor-version numeric comparison instead of an explicit allowlist.

Fixed UpdateNotifier: Pattern.compile() calls moved to static final fields; BufferedReader now uses try-with-resources; latestVersion written before updateAvailable to prevent TOCTOU stale-version display.
Removed dead cache map and CachedPlayerData class from LuckPermsFacade — LuckPerms manages its own cache; null user now logs a warning instead of silently producing empty prefixes.
Fixed static instance field not cleared in onDisable() across all modules — prevents stale plugin reference after unload.
Fixed getCommand() NullPointerException — null-checked before chaining setExecutor/setTabCompleter in all modules.
Fixed MidChatListener and ModernChatListener caching old ChatFormatter — now calls plugin.getChatFormatter() per event so /reload takes effect immediately.
Fixed saveConfig() blocking the main server tick — moved to async task with main-thread reload callback in latest module.
Fixed server.properties path read from relative CWD — now resolved via plugin data folder parent with CWD fallback.
Fixed deprecated Inventory.getTitle() in legacy PrefixGuiListener — replaced with event.getView().getTitle().
Fixed duplicate world format schema silently overwriting each other — legacy 'world-formats' keys now log a warning when both schemas define the same world.
Fixed null value stored for missing YAML position format keys — null values are now skipped.
Removed unused 'current' variable in handlePrefixListClick().
Optimized getTemplates() — templates list is now a static final constant instead of being allocated on every call.
Updated TAB plugin tutorial URL to https://leifiyo.dev/docs/placeholders.
Releases published before structured changelog metadata.
